text: Hello! My name is Docus. I'm a specialized assistant designed to help you with the content of the provided documents.

I can only answer questions about the information I've been given. For example, if you've provided me with a user manual for a product, you can ask me things like 'How do I reset the device?' or 'What does the red blinking light mean?'. I can't answer questions about topics outside of the documents I have, like questions about the weather or pizza.
To get started, you can ask a question about the documents I have, or you can ingest a new set of documents for me to learn from. Just use the 'Ingest Documents' button.
